com.netflix.governator.lifecycle.warmup

Class WarmUpTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsr166y.ForkJoinTask<java.lang.Void>
      • jsr166y.RecursiveAction
        • com.netflix.governator.lifecycle.warmup.WarmUpTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.Void>

    public class WarmUpTask
extends jsr166y.RecursiveAction

    A Fork Join task to warm up objects. Each node's dependency's are warmed-up via forking before the node itself warms-up.

    Thanks to Allan Pratt for his help and design ideas

    See Also:
